title: cn_image.size.ballmer-spread.jpg
description:
Microsoft’s Downfall: Inside the Executive E-mails and Cannibalistic Culture That Felled a Tech Giant

Microsoft not only invent Windows and XBox but also introduce "Stack Ranking" into the modern enterprise management - No matter how good everyone in the team, only 2 people are going to get a great review, 7 are going to get mediocre reviews, and 1 is going to get a terrible review.

Paul Allen told Steve Ballmer on their first meeting: "You looked like a Stalinist Police Officer."

Read more: http://www.vanityfair.com/online/daily/2012/07/microsoft-downfall-emails-steve-ballmer
